bill.title: Relating To Native Hawaiian Higher Education.
bill.description: Establishes an Undergraduate Health Sciences Academy at the University of Hawaii to increase recruitment and retention of Native Hawaiian, Pacific Islander, and first generation college students. Appropriates funds. (SB1294 HD1)

history.action: Introduced.
Passed First Reading.
Referred to HWN/HRE, WAM.
The committee(s) on HWN/HRE has scheduled a public hearing on 02-09-17 1:15PM in conference room 224.
The committee(s) on HWN/HRE has rescheduled its public hearing to 02-09-17 1:15PM in conference room 414.

The committee(s) on HWN recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes in HWN were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) Shimabukuro, Galuteria, English; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Green, Kim.

The committee(s) on HRE recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes in HRE were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) K. Kahele, Kidani, Keith-Agaran; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Espero, Taniguchi.
Reported from HWN/HRE (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 403) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading and referral to WAM.
Report adopted; Passed Second Reading and referred to WAM.
The committee(s) on WAM will hold a public decision making on 02-28-17 1:35PM in conference room 211.

The committee(s) on WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in WAM were as follows: 8 Aye(s): Senator(s) Tokuda, Dela Cruz, English, Galuteria, Harimoto, K. Kahele, Riviere, Shimabukuro; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 3 Excused: Senator(s) Inouye, Taniguchi, Wakai.
Reported from WAM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 806) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading, as amended (SD 1).
48 Hrs. Notice 03-07-17.
Report adopted; Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 1). Ayes, 25; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 0 (none). Transmitted to House.
Received from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 382) in amended form (SD 1).
Pass First Reading
Referred to OMH, HED, FIN, referral sheet 27
Bill scheduled to be heard by OMH on Tuesday, 03-14-17 10:00AM in House conference room 312.
Broadcast of hearing/briefing available. See: www.capitoltv.org

The committees on OMH recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 7 Ayes: Representative(s) Ing, Gates, Creagan, DeCoite, Takayama, Thielen; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) LoPresti; Noes: none; and Excused: none.
Reported from OMH (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1106) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to HED.

Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on HED with Representative(s) LoPresti voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Ichiyama, McKelvey, Oshiro, Souki excused (4).
Bill scheduled to be heard by HED on Tuesday, 03-21-17 2:02PM in House conference room 309.

The committees on HED recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 7 Ayes: Representative(s) McKelvey, Hashem, Creagan, Ohno, Onishi, Woodson, Matsumoto; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Har, Ing.
Reported from HED (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1232), recommending referral to FIN.
Report adopted; referred to the committee(s) on FIN with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Aquino, Ichiyama, Souki excused (3).
Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Wednesday, 04-05-17 2:30PM in House conference room 308.

The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 15 Ayes: Representative(s) Luke, Cullen, DeCoite, Gates, Holt, Keohokalole, Lowen, Tokioka, Quinlan, Yamashita, Ward; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Cachola, LoPresti, Nakamura, Tupola; 2 Noes: Representative(s) Choy, Kobayashi; and Excused: none.
Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1758), recommending passage on Third Reading.

Passed Third Reading with Representative(s) Cachola, LoPresti, Nakamura, Onishi voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Choy, Kobayashi voting no (2) and none excused (0). Transmitted to Senate.
Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 582).
Senate disagrees with House amendments.
Received notice of disagreement (Sen. Com. No. 677).
House Conferees Appointed: Ing, McKelvey, Gates Co-Chairs; Thielen.
Received notice of appointment of House conferees (Hse. Com. No. 587).
Senate Conferees Appointed: Shimabukuro Chair; K. Kahele, Galuteria Co-Chairs.
Received notice of Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 681).
Conference committee meeting scheduled for 04-21-17 1:30PM in conference room 225.
Conference committee meeting to reconvene on 04-24-17 1:30PM in conference room 225.
Conference committee meeting to reconvene on 04-26-17 1:30PM in conference room 225.
Conference committee meeting to reconvene on 04-27-17 1:30PM in conference room 225.
Conference committee meeting to reconvene on 04-28-17 1:30PM in conference room 225.
Carried over to 2018 Regular Session.
Senate Conferee(s) discharged.
Received notice of all Senate conferees being discharged (Sen. Com. No. 1).
House Conferee(s) discharged.
Received notice of discharge of conferees (Hse. Com. No. 385).
